name: The Creature In The Labyrinth
description: The Creature in the Labyrinth is a stealth game where you are encouraged to find your way out of the maze you are located into, by collecting the gems that open the exit. These gems are guarded by a sophisticated creature that is going to try everything in its power to stop you from getting out of there alive.  Face the creature and live to tell the tale, can you beat the monster?
